title: @Riot Fire Diana Skin
body:
A couple months back there was a vote to give a champion a skin based on who won 'Allstars.' Diana was the winner as was team fire. So I was just wondering when we would be getting the new Diana skin.

Diana needs some love as well!


Also, Praise the Moon!

replies.body:
She'll be out a bit later this year. She's currently in the concept phase. 

This skin wasn't intended to be released immediately after All Star.
Since she's still in the concept phase, a suggestion: give her kills the All Star fire finisher.

Do you know when? I've been excited for 2+ months already, I'm thinking of making fire Diana as my next cosplay for a con in May, so a little more affection for her would be appreciated. {{champion:131}}
We haven't announced a release date for her just yet.
Thanks for responding. Was curious. I love Diana but I'm not too particular about either of the skins she has right now.
No worries! I think this skin will break apart what she has in her catalog in terms of variation. :]

Me neither it's like evil emo diana with purple whip hair OR chinese diana whose splash art is GREAT but the in game face and overall clothes suck.
too bad they already took the lunar goddess name for that chinese skin already it could have been a NICE legendary skin name for diana that didn't suck
well she is getting more lore soon so there is your love
